item.title: 404-GEN integrates decentralized 3D model generation platform with Unity
item.description: 404-GEN today announced it has become the first decentralized 3D model generation platform to integrate with Unity.

item.title: VoicePatrol unveils real-time AI voice protection for games
item.description: VoicePatrol is unveiling its real-time AI voice protection technology for game studios to make gaming communities safer.

item.title: Infinite Reality will acquire agentic AI firm Touchcast for $500M
item.description: Infinite Reality is paying $500 million for Touchcast, an agentic AI startup with 70 people. That's the AI boom for ya.

item.title: When AI reasoning goes wrong: Microsoft Research shows more tokens can mean more problems
item.description: Not all AI scaling strategies are equal. Longer reasoning chains are not sign of higher intelligence. More compute isn't always the answer.

item.title: Sam Altman at TED 2025: Inside the most uncomfortable — and important — AI interview of the year
item.description: At TED 2025, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman faced tough questions on AI ethics, artist compensation, and the risks of autonomous agents in a tense interview wi...
